Package com.hammy275.immersivemc.common.immersive.storage.dual.impl

Class ItemStorage

java.lang.Object
com.hammy275.immersivemc.common.immersive.storage.dual.impl.ItemStorage
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetworkStorage, WorldStorage
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnvilStorage, ApothSalvagingTableStorage, BeaconStorage, CraftingTableStorage, ETableWorldStorage, GrindstoneStorage, SmithingTableStorage
public abstract class ItemStorage extends Object implements WorldStorage, NetworkStorage
Functions both as WorldStorage for saving server side and as a NetworkStorage for sending items to the client. Note that only the items array is sent to the client, no other fields are!

      player - Player to get items from
      hand - Hand to get item from
      slot - Slot to merge into
      amount - Amount of items to swap
      forcedMaxImmersiveStackSize - A forced maximum stack size for the slot in the Immersive, or -1 to use the item's stack size.

    • moveSlot

      public void moveSlot(int oldSlot, int newSlot)
      Moves the slot at position oldSlot to position newSlot. Only be used for version conversion, such as the addition of smithing templates in 1.20. The old slot will be made into air and have its item counts wiped.
      Parameters:
      oldSlot - Old slot number
      newSlot - New slot number

    • addSlotsToEnd

      public void addSlotsToEnd(int slotsToAdd)
      Add slotsToAdd number of slots. Really should only be used for version conversion.
      Parameters:
      slotsToAdd - Number of slots to add. Will be added at the end of arrays.
